Review.Titre: Email entry did not function
This company is a scam!
Review.Contenu: Be very careful with this company, they are running a scam!  They tell you for $1,000 per quarter they will deliver grants and loans, but in reality they did nothing.  Often times asking for the same information over and over again and missing several phone appointments.  If they were really able to deliver, they should charge a commission for the work they do but they don’t.  Don’t waste your money on this company.

Review.Titre: The advisor seemed ill prepared
Review.Contenu: The advisor seemed ill prepared. Low energy appeared to be just waking up.  Level of knowledge was below what I would expect.  Also, conversation was less than stellar. No energy or effort at all.  I felt like I was bothering him.  Did not feel comfortable speaking with him. Because he seemed as if he was scrambling to find information to give to me. As opposed to already being prepared.

Review.Titre: The app did not work to schedule my DMV…
Review.Contenu: The app did not work to schedule my DMV appointment and they would not refund me.  I never used the app again after being charge $59.99 and I told them to cancel my subscription.  A year later they auto renewed my subscription and I contacted them immediately. They stated they could only refund me 1/2 of the $59.99 even though I have not used their service. The company and customer service is horrible.  I have disputed them with my bank and I am filing a complaint with as many entities as possible to protect other consumers.

Review.Titre: Last Minute Cancellation
Review.Contenu: Last Minute CancellationMy son was scheduled to take his road test on his 17th birthday at 8am with a Hello Skip concierge to take him to the Motor Vehicles Office. At around 7 the night before, he receives a call saying there was an emergency and they cannot make it. Being so last minute, we were not able to get anyone to take him for his road test with a brake so he missed his test and ruined his entire day. They offered nothing besides my refund, which I was obviously entitled to receive. The service was horrible and it is impossible to get anyone to speak with on the phone. How disappointing for my son and all they could give was an apology.

Review.Titre: Unresponsive after multiple attempts - Don't waste your time
Review.Contenu: I'm not usually the type who gives 1-star reviews, but I felt I should warn others not to waste their money or time with Skips VIP business funding service.  In the 5 months we were "trying" to work with them they were ridiculously unresponsive and unhelpful.  You are supposed to get one monthly phone call.  In 5 months, we received ONE call.  At any given time, we were bounced between assigned concierges or not assigned one at all.  When we did have one, response time was often weeks at a time.  One concierge left the company, another contracted covid.  After reaching out with our concerns we were basically told that we should have requested a different concierge, but when your point of contact isn't responding for weeks how can you do that?  It took multiple emails from both my partner and myself to even get this disappointing response.It definitely doesn't feel like VIP service, and definitely not worth paying for.

Review.Titre: SCAM
Review.Contenu: SCAM! Be aware!!!! I would like a full refund since I asked explicitly your support to let me know of a booking time for DMV within 48 hours and you didn't. The reason I wanted a response before 48 hours is because of your refund policy. I already booked with DMV directly for 31st of March and hoped that Skip will get me a quicker date booking as proposed but you failed to do so and not only that but also you took more than 48 hours in order to keep the money. I would like to request immediate refund! I really wasted my time and effort in believing in your value prop. DONT WASTE YOUR TIME BOOK AT THE DMV DIRECTLY.

Review.Titre: Be honest
Review.Contenu: Be honestThey are still taking money monthly, never did anything And now I'm told the program I signed up for is no longer existing. Why are they still taking my money? I called several times after no communication from them but to watch the utube . Then Jules tells me I need to sign up for VIP access at 499 quarterly. They haven't done Dilley for the almostc1000 I have paid in and now want a couple thousand more!!!!!!! Jules was supposed to call me back but has not. The only way I even was able to connect with her was to sign up as if I were a client just coming in to sign up! Bait and switch? Fraud? Taking advantage of seniors? I thought you were different Skip. I'm glad you have a beautiful office.

Review.Titre: THey are quick to sign you up and get…
Review.Contenu: THey are quick to sign you up and get your billing info but when you actually need help there is nobody around. And try to get a refund for not service. They are very unorganized and seem to take your money with not an ounce of help. ?????????????   Way to take money from a senior citizen once again. Stay far away from this one

Review.Titre: No closer to funding but 100$ poorer
Review.Contenu: Its been almost 3 weeks since I paid for Skips to help me get the funding I was already approved for.  The one on one concierge is as nice as can be however I am no closer to getting the funding from my eidl loan.  After reading reviews of skips and how much it cost it would seem like someone would call and speak with whomever to help your situation.  That is not the case the first response gave me one places into to contact I did not know and directed me to contact SBA which I have done 100 times before this point.  After that I once contacted again by Skips I was given 2 more contacts they hoped would resolve my issue.  One contact forwarded me to SBA and the other still has not responded.  The third time I was contacted by Skips I was asked to go make sure my funds havent been dispersed yet (which I knew they hadnt thats why I paid skips) and to contact my state representatives because that would be the final contact.  In conclusion for the price you pay you will recieve 2 or 3 contacts for you to email and be asked to do the same thing SBA is directing you to do with no help and no answers to why I have not recieved my already approved funding. The team is as nice as can be but so far have not helped with anything now I have been told to wait a week to see if anyone replies Im guessing so I will have to pay 100$ for another month.

Review.Titre: It had been a bad experience with your…
Review.Contenu: It had been a bad experience with your team not calling on my appointment days and times.

Review.Titre: I had the worst experience with them…
Review.Contenu: I had the worst experience with them and my credit went down. They are brand new in business and can not give you advice to help.

Review.Titre: No out of pocket, just time and work wasted
Review.Contenu: Have to, because I finally did want to hear what others had to say on Trust... and not the reviews.. they're replies... has me tapping. Followed Ryder on Youtube during covid... liked the guy. Really looked like he was helping some folks on eidl. Four months ago, inquired about their NEW affiliate program. Showed them what we do, Linkedin... 19 year biz, they flew at me. All good, go here, Dash is here... Get them to The Sign Up... big commissions. Put a first class email piece together... we have Lists. Server. Verification software. Tracking on sends. We took clicks! But their Click Tracking Service... in Transylvania... REALLY... was showing half on our Dashboard with them, of what we saw on our In Real Time stats. Fast as I can. Called, emailed, message... with the questions. Their tracking companies email address was bogus. We verified it as not a working email. Four weeks, a dozen attempts. Five call messages. Finally their "affiliate Manager" emailed (only because I kept c.c.ing to Ryder) and said... wait for it... your emails have us concerned! Ha. Good one. Now we can't get off the platform, every email SELL that comes through, we hit Unsubscribe and does nothing. We even  offered to give them our batch of confirmed Clicks to their Sign Up. We quit sending after 10 days. Our Dash shows Zero Sign Ups. Not surprising. Don't go near these guys. Not worth your effort. Month in, our time working for them... and the only reply on a simple, fair question... your emails are concerning. Stop calling us out on what we don't do and have no answer for and.... out of sight, out of mind.

Review.Titre: Untrustworthy & Unreliable
Review.Contenu: I booked for a road test concierge through Skip and that was a HUGE mistake. First, it signed me up for their annual PAID subscription when I booked, which i suppose is my bad for not reading carefully enough. Totally fine, mistakes happen, I go to cancel the subscription. I can’t find ANY way to do that on the site so after plenty of googling, I find their Terms Of Use and the link to unsubscribe there. I read it carefully, i have SCREENSHOTS of the TOS statement; no where did it say that cancelling the yearly membership would cancel my appointment. I even checked in the booked services tab to confirm, my appointment was still there and all good. Fast forward 2 weeks, day of my appointment, and THATS WHEN I FIND OUT IT WAS CANCELLED. I had no idea because 1) never got any email or contact about it 2) THEY KEPT THE MONEY FOR IT. If I’d gotten some random refund I would have known immediately that something was amiss. I only found out because I contacted the driver directly with the phone number they provided. In their email response to me, they claim the driver cancelled due to emergency but happily offered to reschedule me~~~ but my driver stated that not only was there nothing booked today, but she hadn’t been notified about a potential appointment at all. So they failed to schedule me, blamed it on an employee who had no knowledge and STILL HAVEN’T REFUNDED ME. The second the conversation shifted from “we can reschedule you!!!” to “i don’t want to be rescheduled I want a REFUND” i got RADIO SILENCE. NO RESPONSE. I’m still waiting!! And while I wait I will be leaving this review every where i can, so please do take your time Skip. I’m telling you now, this service is a scam in the very literal sense, please do not trust them with your money.

Review.Titre: I signed up for their vip program for grant and loan service
Review.Contenu: I signed up for their vip program for $199 a month with 2 months free for their black Friday special. I talked to the onboarder on 11/28. After the onboarding call, they said they would email me loan options and grants. I never got an email that day. I waited over a week to hear something. Then I get an email from the company that no onboarding call was done or scheduled. They booked a call for me. I changed it for the next day when I got the email. They apologize for what happened and the previous onboarder will get back to me. If they don't they will follow up with me. The previous onboarder never got back to me and I sent the new onboarder an email that evening. I still have not heard from her the next day. I reached out to a few people whom I made contact with within the company. I am still waiting for a reply. I only got an email from a person to cancel my reoccurring billing. So the narrative of the story is they don't follow thru like they promised and they like to prolong things for people to keep being billed $199 a month. On top of things already being delayed with the processing time. Not to mention when you call their phone #, no one answers and no one returns the calls. I asked for my $199 back and if they don't refund it, I will file a dispute with my credit card. This company is a joke.  Don't recommend them. They are impossible to work with and they are not transparent. I'll watch there free youtube videos and find someone else to perform the service. This is what I recommend to everyone.

Review.Titre: Buisness down the drain while Skips tries to steal every dollar they can!!
Review.Contenu: I had paid for a premium membership with Skips at the end of March 2022 to figure out why my EIDL loan had not be funded when I was approved and signed documents on 12-18-21.  The concierge was as nice as could be at advising me to call SBA (which I had done 100 times) to make sure my loan wasn't funded (I think I would know if that much money was in my bank account) then telling me to contact my state representative and that was the end of the line.  So that's what you get when you contact Skips and reach out for help for yourself or your business.  My loan had already been approved was already showing on my credit report and actually recieved an email to setup repayment for money I never recieved.  When I first signed up with Skip I was told I had recieved a free month of service set to begin the following month.  So after 30 days of going back and forth stressing, struggling,  and getting nowhere I was hopeful the following "free" month of service would be enough to get the funds dispersed.  However at the end of April 2022 I reached out to Skips to verify that I would have a free month which I was told "yes thank you for your business" however within the next 2 weeks my credit card was charged 5 times for the 95$ monthly rate.  Yes 5 TIMES twice being 5 minutes apart at 6am this morning May 6th 2022.  I was informed by SBA today that EIDL funds had been exhausted so I would not be receiving anything eventhough they did a hard pull on my credit and even put I had a 23,000 loan.  So now I have to deal with the credit bureaus and the SBA which we all know how thats gonna go since you can't get any information from them and my credit card company from all the charges from Skips. I am an honest hardworking American and I want to warn everyone SKIPS IS A SCAM!!! THEY WILL CHARGE YOU MULTIPLE TIMES WHILE TELLING YOU TO CALL THE SAME PLACE YOU HAVE BEEN DEALING WITH!!! After everything that has went on the last 2 years I didn't take a PPP loan because my buisness did not need it at the time, did not recieve any of the grants alot of scammers did recieve, and now my 6 year buisness I've given everything for health, family time, mentally, physically all goes down the drain while SKIPS tries to rob whatever they can get thats left...

Review.Titre: Awful company, avoid
Review.Contenu: They strung me along in a customer service chat for over a week about finalizing an assigned driver after paying upfront, then told me a day before a very important appointment that i have to miss now because the driver (that they never assigned me) wouldn't be able to do it. I dont know if the company has issues due to Covid, or is just a scam but avoid Skip at all costs. I sure wish I had.

Review.Titre: Awful customer service
Review.Contenu: Awful customer service. My teenage son accidentally used Helloskip for a DMV service. I did not realize it until the service auto-renewed, and I was out $84. Because I did not catch this charge within 48 hours, I was not entitled to a refund. They did me a favor by offering half of the money back. So my kid used the service 1 time, last year, and I have to pay for future services I will never use. It's like lighting money on fire.

Review.Titre: This is the most ridiculous service…
Review.Contenu: This is the most ridiculous service that I have ever come across. A few weeks now I  sent an email because you cannot speak to anyone and no one has responded. You do not know who you are dealing with and if you need any info about charges forget it as no on responds to you. Very, Very poor customer relations. I am totally dissatisfied.

Review.Titre: One star because no star doesn't work.
Review.Contenu: One star because no star doesn't work.They cancelled twice on me the day before the test. Both times the driver "had an emergency", and oh wonder, oh wonder, there was no replacement available. Do not book with this company - you will find yourself rescheduling your road test over and over. BIG FAIL!

Review.Titre: Terrible service, took our money
Review.Contenu: Terrible service. Tried to use them to book appointments for Real ID. They would not find 2 appointments near each other for my husband and me, even though we would have to drive a long distance.  I repeatedly asked them to search again. They didn’t find anything and took 2 months fees from our fixed income senior budget. Awful!!!!!  We went to AAA which was a breeze, close by, and had absolutely lovely staff!  Don’t use these people who are taking money from people in need!

Review.Titre: Took my money and provided no service
Review.Contenu: I used Helloskip when it was still called yogov and found the service to work great in CA. But then I moved to a new area and needed to book a DMV appointment.They:1) Said they supported booking appointments in my area2) Charged me $60.3) Did not book the appointment I had ordered.4) After contacting customer support they claim they do not support bookings in my area and won't give me a refund.5) Their website still claims they support bookings in my area.So beware. Your experience may be great, or you may end up paying them for nothing.

Review.Titre: Two missed appointments
Review.Contenu: I live in Portland. I’ve tried twice to get a car for a dmv test, and both times they’ve waited until the last second to tell me that they won’t be fulfilling the appointment at all. Two missed tests for a license, I was lucky to be able to reschedule the first appointment with the DMV but now I’m totally out of luck for the next few months because of how busy they are. Misleading company. The only thing good I can say is that they refunded me.

Review.Titre: Really hate the service
Review.Contenu: Really hate the service, I already have an appointment on Jan 5th 2021, to get my license quickly, I used hello skip and they scheduled for Jan 21st 2021, later date of my actual appointment, and charged me $84 from my card and when asked they are not processing my refund and no proper response. Don’t use this service

Review.Titre: BEWARE no dmv in over a year and charges 126 for nothing…
Review.Contenu: HS said they could help get a dmv appointment faster.. No appointment in over 1 year, then they charges me another 84$ for another year!!  When I complained they said maybe they could give me back 42.... so 126$ for doing nothing for over 1 year.  Beware

Review.Titre: Hello skip cancelled my dmv concierge…
Review.Contenu: Hello skip cancelled my dmv concierge service less than 24h before my appointment. The only reason to use their service is when you don't have a car to take the driving test so what's the point if they don't show up! AVOID THEM! Very unreliable!!!

Review.Titre: PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE CONSIDERING…
Review.Contenu: PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE CONSIDERING THIS COMPANYOn August 18th I booked the road test concierge. In one minute, they deducted $249 from my account. Surprisingly, I knew later that the only appt available would be on October 7th. I wasn´t happy and asked them to try an earlier appointment. They didn´t succeed and that's fine. On September 10th I updated my pickup address, which is only 14 minutes from my previous one. They confirmed my new address by text message. Today, one week prior to the test, and just because I asked for an update, I was informed that concierges in my area are inactive. They canceled my appt and didn´t even speak with me about an option. Oh! Actually they suggested I look for local driving schools which provide a similar service.

Review.Titre: Had a call for this morning
Review.Contenu: Had a call for this morning. 730. Horrible service. Told couldn't find in system only by text.Paid 89 on 15th. David no response after 15 minutes texting. Need a call.

Review.Titre: Scam
Review.Contenu: Scam , don't waste your time . No phone answer.

Review.Titre: This app will keep your card info and…
Review.Contenu: This app will keep your card info and keep attempting to take money from you avoid theme at all cost I hate that I even fell for the scheme

Review.Titre: Did not find me an earlier spot for…
Review.Contenu: Did not find me an earlier spot for auto road skill testConcierge service was really good

Review.Titre: Rippoff
Review.Contenu: Rippoff. they make it extremely complicated to cancel your membership. I

Review.Titre: What a rip off
Review.Contenu: What a rip off. You could make an appointment by your self faster.

Review.Titre: cause they cancel at the last min and…
Review.Contenu: cause they cancel at the last min and had to wait to get a refund

Review.Titre: DON'T PAY YOUR MONEY TO THESE GUYS ON…
Review.Contenu: DON'T PAY YOUR MONEY TO THESE GUYS ON HELLO SKIP. THEY WILL GET YOUR MONEY AND THEN LEAVE YOU HANGING. HELLO SKIP IS A JOKE FROM MY EXPERIENCES. I REACHED OUT TO RYDER ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS TO HELP WITH THE PPP AND THE EDIL GRANTS BUT ALL I GOT IS THE RUNAROUND. I REQUESTED MY MONEY BACK THAT I PAID FOR THEIR LOAN CONCIERGE SERVICE AND GOT NO HELP FROM ANYONE ON HERE. PLEASE DON'T FALL FOR THIS, THEY ARE CHARGING FOR SERVICES THAT YOU CAN FIND ANYWHERE ON THE INTERNET FOR FREE. I AM VERY DISAPOINTED. HERE IS THE LATEST MESSAGE THAT I RECEIVED BACK FROM THEM "Hi there,Thanks for getting back. Unfortunately we're only able to refund the original card, and we've done so. Can you double check that you're able to receive that refund on the existing card? To prevent any fraud, this is policy for nearly all companies.As mentioned, we got an exception to issue the 50% refund in this case, which normally we're unable to do. Please let us know when you receive the refund and as mentioned, please reach out to Ryder if you have additional questions on the EIDL grants and loans and PPP.I do see the record that he's spoken with you a couple times and has attempted to call you a handful of additional times as well.If you don't want the partial refund but would like to continue getting help from Ryder and our team, let us know and I can reverse. We're here to help anytime and hope you're having a great Monday!" I HAVE NO LIE TO PUT ON THESE GUYS, JUST DON'T FALL FOR ANY OF THEIR PAID SERVICES. DON'T GET DESPERATE FOR THEIR HELP LIKE I DID AND GET JACKED!

Review.Titre: Terrible, Awful, never again!!!
Review.Contenu: Terrible! Awful experience! Decided to use their Concierge Service to take my driving test. Well, let me tell you SKIP them!!! And run away!!!! They will take your money and you will be left hanging..empty handed with a huge question mark!!!! They took the payment $250 right away however no one followed up or sent any instructions or anything for me to know what to expect?! I’m like Hello??? Now what?! I waited but still nothing. Then I started to worry!! Calling, texting, live chatting, emailing … you name it!! Silence! One of the phone numbers on live chat was a wrong number (a woman picked up chewing her lunch surprised she got a call about smth she has noooo any clue!). Finally got a person on live chat talking like a “robot” but not giving me any answers! They say WE are legit! Well, give me a LEGIT answer..one answer pls!!! I took screenshots of the whole conversation. Then after a while she finally told me that that service is NOT available any more in my city!! What a hack!?!?! Why don’t you update your website. There is a drop down menu to find your city..we’ll update your information for the mother of Gods!! At they point after spending all the time trying to talk to a real LEGIT representative of That “funny” company all I wanted is just to get my money back!!! This lady..Patricia is still talking like a robot..trying to be nice..giving one million excuses without any answers..I was typing straight that I do not want anything else anymore with the company..just give me back my money!!! She asked me to wait..again..and after another 15 mins just staring into my phone screen she says word by word “that the billing usually responds in 24-48 hrs!!” OMG. Long story short: by the end of the day I spoke to another person, very professional. He texted me. And couple hours later I got an email saying I will get my refund in 10 days… thank you for nothing!

Review.Titre: I canceled my subscription
Waste of Time
Review.Contenu: I paid for the premium service because I wanted Hello Skips help with grants. Under the premium service they would apply to all possible grants on my behalf after I filled out their detailed questionnaire. I filled their questionnaire and my account manager was impressed with the information I entered. Jenee said that usually she had to coach people on what to write, but it wasn’t necessary for the information I provided. She agreed that they would start to apply for grants on my behalf. So far, they have only applied to their own grant on my behalf. They have not applied to any other grant that I selected in my dash board. In my experience, if you are unmotivated and need a cheerleader to help you get funding then feel free to hire them. If you are motivated in getting your own funding then they are not necessary. I only wanted their help with grant applications and private credit opportunities. So far their only real solution has been to get a loan with Newtek. But I found over 3 banks that offer better rates and terms than Newtek.

Review.Titre: They offer service they cannot deliver
Review.Contenu: They offer service they cannot deliver, complete waste of time and effort, at least they refunded the money

Review.Titre: Still waiting for my appointment.
Review.Contenu: I made the payment, however i am still waiting on my appointment going to my second week.. what is the hold up you guys already have been paid.?

Review.Titre: Your driving instructor is rude
Review.Contenu: Your driving instructor is rude. She made me nervous the first minutes i sit in her car.

Review.Titre: For my new app download i didn't…
Review.Contenu: For my new app download i didn't receive my $10 bonus.

Review.Titre: Setting an appointment isnt the best.
I have no need of your service.
Initial Consultation
Review.Contenu: The concept is great and the representative was personable and helpful but I believe it's the lack of total understanding either in my presentation or the representative's understanding. I thought I specifically indicated we wanted grants first and loans second. I also indicated, while a partnership, we wanted a loan focused, if possible, on my signature alone as the 51% owner. Instead, I received one grant due within five (5) business days and a call from an SBA 7(a) lender who only provides the SBA portfolio or secured working capital loans. The combination of the two just won't work. My next meeting is scheduled for 3/2/2023 and there isn't any way to re-emphasize my concerns above in 15 minutes. I will await the next meeting to determine if my review experience should change.

Review.Titre: I know for a fact that this is great…
Review.Contenu: I know for a fact that this is great company, but however I got a email asking about my meeting, so I replied that I didn’t have a meeting with that person,I received the same email again, I pay for premium, this doesn’t reflect premium. I also asked about a question my the. No respond… “Premium ain’t looking good at all”

Review.Titre: I been a customer a couple of time with…
Review.Contenu: I been a customer a couple of time with this firm I am not gonna disclose my experience I am just giving the new representative a chance to prove me a different experience

Review.Titre: Pending
Review.Contenu: Remediation in progress. Will update in 2 weeks.

Review.Titre: The driver they provided both times was…
Review.Contenu: The driver they provided both times was amazing however my experience with Skip was hit and miss. One time a driver just did not turn up so I had to book a new DMV road test. I also had to chase them up once to remind them that I had a test appointment  and they had not booked a driver. I also had a friend that used Skip and their driver cancelled with just three hours notice so it seems to be more common than it is.

Review.Titre: Skip did it with my project get…
Review.Contenu: Skip did it with my project get connected with the Capital Funding within a month

Review.Titre: Reconsideration to the good
Review.Contenu: Previously had a communication breakdown causing me to input a poor review, but Ryder did call me and straighten out the issues. Hopefully we are on the road to a great partnership. Waiting for the process to turn into our favor. I will keep everyone posted!!

Review.Titre: EIDL loan Reconsideration processing help
Review.Contenu: Ms. Allison has been helping us with our reconsideration EIDL loan process through the SBA. We have basically done all that was required of us but still haven't been fortunate with the SBA processing our EIDL.  We do not have a loan officer as of yet.  So we reached out to SKIP and Allison was assigned to us.  She has been the consummate professional and is currently working with us.

Review.Titre: Experience with SKIP
Review.Contenu: I don't feel  I have had enough time with one person.  So far, I have been assigned to 3.  Never enough time to get much accomplished.   I am given instructions, new to me, then I am trying to follow through while working 12 +  hours/day with daycare kids.  I don't feel as if I get much accomplished as I have been instructed - my fault,  I love working with Mel.

Review.Titre: Watch his videos & PROVIDE list of Grants
Review.Contenu: I like to watch his videos he does provide very good information maybe we need to set up some interviews with regular people I know he did one with a congressman that was really terrific. We need people to start businesses because startups produce jobs so more interviews with them what they're seeking and also providing SBA loans and grants for startup businesses is a must.

Review.Titre: I would like to thank you for all of…FOR ASSISTING US IN GETTING FUNDED...
Review.Contenu: I would like to thank you for all of your information. It was completely accurate. Your breakdown of what to do made the biggest difference. We had been going back forth with EDIL loads for over year. Once, I started watching your video it better direction, what I should be asking when I call in. We were funded and have apply for increase. Thank you again.

Review.Titre: Great service !
Review.Contenu: Love Skip, been avidly following or participating in the paid membership 2 years. Very informative & helpful. In the process of getting help with my Eidl loan that I applied for in 2020. My concierge is very helpful but as usual, waiting on the Sba & that's very disappointing.

Review.Titre: Don’t get me wrong
Review.Contenu: Don’t get me wrong, I Iike the service so far just wish the prices was a bit faster and/or automated/streamlined

Review.Contenu: The company is growing fast and the resources that are available to the clients are increasing.

Review.Contenu: Skip always keeps me informed and up to date with the latest grant information.

Review.Contenu: Elesha was very professional, helpful,and knowledgeable! I am pleased with the service.

Review.Titre: Great Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I had a question regarding the EIDL Advance Grant being stuck in reconsideration, so I asked a team member from Hello Skip. I had a response later on that night. I was given awesome advice. Great Customer service is what I received with the  Hello Skip family. So, thank you very much.

Review.Contenu: I had problems trying to get another appointment because the other one I had earlier hadn't cleared yet. Had to reschedule so try to make appointment the app was delayed on making it. The customer service team was friendly and tried to help.

Review.Contenu: Ray was spot on in providing the projected timing of the SBA processing our application which allowed us to make better business decisions in the meantime

Review.Titre: If i would have known taken my written…
Review.Contenu: If i would have known taken my written test i could have taken my road test.        So that why 4 star.Did skip know.

Review.Titre: Got my real ID in the mail quicker than…
Review.Contenu: Got my real ID in the mail quicker than I expected.Thank you Helloskip you came through again!!!

Review.Titre: Everything went well and I was even…
Review.Contenu: Everything went well and I was even answered before my scheduled time.Great experience.

Review.Contenu: David was warm and welcoming. I look forward to working with him again

Review.Titre: They help people at 90% is fine
aceses to the loan calculator
Review.Contenu: I still do not have aceses to the loan calculator otherwise great

Review.Titre: Great job
Review.Contenu: Great job well done

Review.Titre: I attended a webinar about submitting great grant answers.
Review.Contenu: I attended a webinar about submitting great grant answers. The information was very informative. The presenter shared some upcoming updates to the platform to be on the lookout for. Skip shares lots of information about the many grants that are offered a keeps you abreast of their deadlines. Skip also offers information about business funding. I look forward to see what other business funding sources are available.

Review.Titre: I was skeptical at first
Review.Contenu: I was skeptical at first, but quickly learned that grant writing isn't easy(its a science) with out the experienced coaches at skip, the knowledge they provide on how the answers are to be presented I would have been lost.My coach RAY was absolutely amazing, very knowledgeable about grant writing and what the judging panel look for,Ray was very patient with me as im not computer savvy, with the help from the Skip program, and coach Ray I was able to secure a grant,Thank you Skip and coach Ray

Review.Titre: Another valuable Skip webinar
Review.Contenu: Another valuable Skip webinar! It's so great to see grants being won by real people, real businesses with vision and integrity. Bravo!

Review.Titre: How to give great grant answers
Review.Contenu: The information provided was very helpful.

Review.Titre: Hello Skip is an amazing resource!
Review.Contenu: This team is amazing, they created a business plan for my fitness studio pilatesbyvalerie.com. The plan is well written, professionally done and comprehensive.

Review.Titre: Epitome of Excellence
Review.Contenu: First of all Ryder is the most down to earth presenter over I've ever seen. He creates this feeling that you are amongst hundreds of others watching him do his thing. We know this n not to be true. However, he makes you feel like you are the only one in the room.  The epitome of approachable and that is very important to someone like me who is brand new to the game. This could be rebranded as a course that shows how to present a YouTube live.

Review.Titre: Positive Skip review
Review.Contenu: I've been working with Sha'Tarra at Skip for about 6 months now.  And although I'm still trying to find the right lender, she has been extremely helpful providing lenders, grant opportunities and industry updates.  It is definitely worth your time and money to work with professions like Skip to avoid the wrong lenders.

Review.Titre: A great app to apply and track funding applications!
Review.Contenu: The Skip grant funding tracker has been very helpful in finding and tracking grants. There are also regular updates on new grants for a one stop shop for funding opportunities. I highly recommend this app.  Castel's Posh Closet

Review.Titre: the opportunity shop
Review.Contenu: Skip is like a one stop shop where opportunity and knowledge knock.  There is a charge for membership but I don’t have a problem with that because they give back in so many ways. I definitely recommend skip to fellow business owners.  It will become you “go to” place for up to date information

Review.Titre: Every business owner should 100% use…
Review.Contenu: Every business owner should 100% use Skip and their team. I've been following them for 2 years, finally decided to become a VIP member and they helped me get substantial SBA 7A loan. Most importantly, they're available to guide me, show me new opportunities too apply for, and save me hours of wasted time. Huge thank you to the entire Skip team.

Review.Titre: Wes is A TOTAL GEM!
Review.Contenu: Wes is A TOTAL GEM!! I so appreciate his professionalism, thoroughness,  and honesty.  He didn't waste my time-- THANK YOU WES, and he was diligent with helping me to find resources specific to my needs. Plus, he has a personable aura around him which made our communication easy, which I REALLY APPRECIATE. Give WES A RAISE or PROMOTION, AHORA!!!! 😆 🤣 😂  Nah for Real.... HE DESERVES EVERY GOOD THING!!!

Review.Titre: u cant afford not to use SKIP
Review.Contenu: These guys were of great help when I was submitting my 3rd EIDL appeal. Kala (private concierge) clearly told me everything I needed to fill out, how to fill it out, and even checked my forms after my first drafts. She was available for calls and via email to answer questions, and knew important details of how the SBA works and handles applications. If your stuck with an application or don't know if its even worth submitting another appeal, reach out to the people at skip, and you wont be disappointed. I finally got my EIDL approved after 4 tries following Kayas advice. AWESOME GUYS THANKS!! 😃😀😃🤣🤣

Review.Titre: David Uriate is the BEST!
Review.Contenu: David Uriate is amazing in every way! If his replies to my numerous questions could be more prompt- the would precede my inquiry 😂 David is extremely well versed in the countless scenarios that a small business owner often finds themselves facing. He has provided dozens of documents and template letter that were critical to attach. But his sage wisdom and knowledgeable guidance continues to make working with David U. both pleasant and reassuring in every way!! Thank you David for your support and guidance. We certainly lucked up to have you as our “Advisor”. You’re the best! Rachael A. Madison, Alabama

Review.Titre: Skip
Review.Contenu: Skip, and my Consultant, Ray B., have been, and are constantly, the greatest support network one would desire in these trying times.  They cut through the "noise" we all get fed and really understand this dynamic.  I am eternally grateful for my experience with Skip (the Company) and in particular, Ray B. (my personal representative, steadfast super smart consultant and positive force like the globe circles).  Cheers and With Sincerity,Jason K. W.

Review.Titre: Hello Skip! Need To SEE It! Great Knowelege
Review.Contenu: Hello Skip, great professionalism, however, I've applied for the grants and still applying. Also, regarding website information,  just found out I have to pay more fees if I want to get a website going. So far so I've joined the premium membership services it's Good- thus far, just ready to here back from someone!

Review.Titre: Skip is 100% Real
Review.Contenu: I joined Skip after seeing an ad online. I suppose my computer was paying attention to my Google search history and knew I was having trouble dealing with the Small Business Administration. I was stuck in their loan processing for over 1 year with no available help. This all changed after joining Skip. I was immediately connected to David Uriarte who provided one-on-one consulting and within 2 weeks my loan was complete and funded. My only regret is not knowing about Skip in the beginning. I give Skip and David Uriarte my highest regard! They know how to get through the system!

Review.Titre: Hello
Review.Contenu: Hello, Skip! I’m trying so hard to stay positive in re-starting my business. I lost my child care business in 2020. I have no revenue. My clients never came back after COVID broke out.🥺🥺🥺😢😢 I want to start a positive affirmation self-care box to uplift others who have suffered or are suffering from depression during this covid climate to inspire them to dreams, goals, and aspirations. I want to include a goal/prayer journal, budget planner, self-affirmation stickers, and resources for mental health illnesses. I don't want to give up but I'm so sad because nothing is working. Encouraging Words please 🙏 🙏

Review.Titre: SBA NEEDS HELP
Review.Contenu: Updates and new information is super helpful as the government doesn't stand bye there word or inform in a way to keep up with changing the rules

Review.Titre: Omar was very thorough and detail…
Review.Contenu: Omar was very thorough and detail during the process while I was completing the forms needed. He revised themMore than once before I finally submitted the forms to SBAI was approved the following Monday and funded 4 days after.I then applied for the max increase almost two weeks later again emailed Omar all steps as I received the emails from SBA and he guided was approved the same day which was yesterday currently waiting to get funded.It’s been a positive experience.

Review.Titre: Ray has been extremely helpful in…
Review.Contenu: Ray has been extremely helpful in getting us the funds needed through the EIDL process thus far. She has been very knowledgeable and was able to answer all of our questions as well making the step by step process required to get funded very simple. We recommend HelloSkip to anyone struggling to get clarity on the EIDL process and getting funded. Ray at HelloSkip especially will help make the process completely seamless for anyone who chooses to work with her. Thank you again!

Review.Titre: EIDL LOAN APPROVED AFTER APPEAL
Review.Contenu: I have been working with David and Ryder for EIDL loan modification ,reconsideration and appeal for the past 6 months.  They provide very valuable information in every steps of the way . At the end , I got approved for 1.2 M after appeal. YES , SKIP  is great for small business . I recommend their service without any reservation.Luwei King, M.D.

Review.Titre: Jenee with SKIP is awesome!
Review.Contenu: Jenee is my contact specialist and I absolutely love her! She is personal and relatable for our business needs. She has put us at ease and provides adequate knowledge for the financial growth of our family business.  Skip is allowing the fire to control burn in the growth and expansion of our business in the industry we are in,

Review.Titre: Thank David Uriarte…
Review.Contenu: I have to thank David Uriarte personally and concierge program from Skip. My company was one of the first to apply for an EIDL loan just over two years ago. We just were approved today. Like many, when the pandemic hit, we did not have a working knowledge of the the SBA. David helped with suggesting the proper forms required, guiding us through the reconsideration process. If I recall  correctly it was an SBA webinar where I found out about Skip. What a great service for small business. Thank you all.

Review.Titre: Jenee Zamorano
Review.Contenu: First had the good fortune of speaking with Jenee on January 20 after she was recommended, with very high praise, by Jules.  Up until the point I had my first 30 minute call with Jenee, I was wandering blindly through the weight of the work before us. The moment Jenee came on the line, she was upbeat and friendly and put me right at ease. She knew her way around nonprofits, knew her way around Latin American countries, and the needs thereof, and was very obviously knowledgeable in navigating the expectations of a donor base. Straight away she shared a phrase that has truly changed the trajectory of our approach. That is, "We are not asking. We are inviting.".  I can't say enough about how delighted I am to be led by Jenee and her expertise. Always looking forward to our next call. Thank you!!!

Review.Titre: Superb!
Review.Contenu: Skip has been such a great asset that I have been privileged to partake in and use. They offer an awesome service there isn't anything like them around. Try them I promise you will not be disappointed!

Review.Titre: Skip is a Great Facilitator for Grants!
Review.Contenu: Skip has devoted himself to tracking grant opportunities and bringing these to his followers. He also shares his great knowledge to help small businesses and entrepreneurs succeed in writing grants. He fills a critical need that helps grant applicants focus their attention on the grants they need.

Review.Titre: Excellent help for small business…
Review.Contenu: Excellent help for small business owners looking for funding.  These people truly care about you, they care about your business and they care about who you are.  It's rare, but I believe Skip has been able to capture and capitalize on something that no banks, lenders, or the government seems to understand:  Customer Service.

Review.Titre: Ryder Pearce and the entire team of…
Review.Contenu: Ryder Pearce and the entire team of SKIP are extremely knowledgable, and helpful.  Success is their strategy for every small business/Entrepreneur and especially those affiliated with SKIP. David U was nice to speak with, back in August concerning various memberships' benefits, and Crissy, SKIP Concierge Expert, was great to briefly work with. She advised me of a Grant opportunity I did not know existed right in my State.  I appreciate the expertise SKIP provides. The videos are MOST helpful for all of us to benefit from.

Review.Titre: The information is pertinent and timely…
Review.Contenu: The information is pertinent and timely and can be used in real time to make critical financial decisions. This is valuable for a small business like mine. Not only to get funding but also to plan and be well placed in the market place with the relevant information.

Review.Titre: The webinar on how to write a Business…
Review.Contenu: The webinar on how to write a Business Plan was eye opening.  I've been curious about AI for writing grants, and now a business plan resource, it was great, looking forward to learning more.

Review.Titre: Love the team at Hello Skip always on…
Review.Contenu: Love the team at Hello Skip always on top of everything and leaving us business owners the tools and guidance we need for any kind of help Love it cant get enough keep it coming

Review.Titre: Thank you Jesus
Review.Contenu: I like the information concerning grants, funding, startup business, being informative concerning this in government and everyone. Skip and Team are great people to work with. They tell you about upcoming grants things to read, look out for. Thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you Jesus. Have a blessed day and prosperous months to you, your family, and businesses

Review.Titre: "Without Wes, your loan will be less"
Review.Contenu: Wes was perfect. He knew what I needed, offered advice and has set me on the correct path towards success with my SBA loan increase by helping me organize my submission paperwork properly. He's a funny, friendly and knowledgeable person and it as actually fun to talk to him.

Review.Titre: I'd Give 6 Stars If I Could
Review.Contenu: Allison from Skip has been nothing short of amazing. She has been there at every step with practical guidance and support in our journey to obtain an increase to our existing EIDL loan from SBA. They certainly know the landscape very well. You cannot go wrong. I would give 6 stars if it was an option. Thank you Allison and the team at Skip!

Review.Titre: SKIP went above and beyond…
Review.Contenu: Allison with SKIP went above and beyond reviewing all our documents, catching things left out that would have delayed us. Most of all punctual, professional and true support through sorting our loan process out. Thanks Allison, SKIP Team for all the support. Also a big shout out to Ryder who good or bad over the last few years has kept us updated on happenings and never dramatic but very professional, it kept us coming back and still check for updates by SKIP daily! SKIP has helped our funeral homes become better in operations in returns allows more support to clients we serve!

Review.Titre: This company of excellence service!
Review.Contenu: This company give excellent, courteous caring help. Give you great grant reports to help members get funds needed to prosper in my business. Give important news on college debt cancellation, world issues, government, president, much more. I really appreciate.

Review.Titre: Elesha helped me get my EIDL loan faster
Review.Contenu: Elesha helped me understand the SBA EIDL process and what to do and not do. Most businesses were super frustrated with the broken system the SBA was using. With Elesha’s help, I received my loan faster and easier than most other business I was following on social media sites like Reddit and YouTube,

Review.Titre: Ray is amazing
Review.Contenu: Ray is amazing, thank you all for what you do. I've gotten information from y'all that I could not find anywhere else that has helped my business greatly. Would certainly recommend!

Review.Titre: MY EIDL LOAN IS APPROVED after got denied the first time
Review.Contenu: I am so grateful to have the expert guidance from Ray at Skip Concierge and GOT my EIDL loan approved! I was denied at first because I didn't know how to handle the paperwork properly. Thanks to Ray's patience to guide me throughout the reconsideration process from writing the reconsideration letter to each step of the way with productive encouragement. I am so excited to be approved for the amount that I need to build my big business plan. Skip Concierge was worth the investment! I highly recommend it, and they also guide you on available grants for small businesses. Thank you Ray and SKIP!

Review.Titre: Keeping Our Business' Afloat and moving in the positive direction
Review.Contenu: From the beginning, when our business started struggling and then the Pandemic hit us, I stumbled across your YouTube videos regarding the EIDL Loan and your channel was that ray of hope we prayed for. Now, our business (trucking) has been hit with additional setbacks such as increased Diesel Fuel Price hikes, rates for hauling loads have plummeted from $5-$6 a mile to an average $2 or less a mile ( Nationwide), while our insurance and truck are higher ,just to name a few of our setbacks.  Your recent YouTube video on lowering our EIDL payments came at the right time because it seemed that we were about go under. Now we need to connect with your Client Success Managers ASAP to follow through on the Hardship Application and other services. Your services are a necessary investment for business survival.Thanks again, RR II

Review.Titre: EIDL increase help  was given
Review.Contenu: I contacted Skip/ Dave a couple times and he gave me some good advice I'm still following to get my EIDL increase  completed. I haven't had a conclusion on my situation yet. But his advice seems like it may be helping.

Review.Titre: Amazing Support and Dedication!
Review.Contenu: Without Skip there was no way I would have been able to Navigate the channels for funding without there help.  They are wonderful to work with and understand the needs of small business owners and Self Employed individuals and put a lot of care and dedication into listening to your needs.  I would recommend them to anyone in any Business!  Thank you Skip! :)

Review.Titre: We LOVE Skip
Review.Contenu: We have had a great experience with Skip. Kala has been a great help to both of our companies and we will continue to work with Skip for the continued growth of our company. We have found our monthly calls to be overly helpful, she has been monumental in our understanding of funding options and preparing us for 7A.

Review.Titre: Since the beginning of my relationship…
Review.Contenu: Since the beginning of my relationship with the Skip team and Kala I have had nothing but a positive experience. Kala goes above and beyond to make sure I have all the information I need to make my journey with them a success. I haven't seen a team work as hard and care so much. Highly recommend.

Review.Titre: The 5 star Plus
Review.Contenu: The 5 star Plus, one on one help, the number 1 knowledgeable assistance needed and then some.I've been with Yogov as a Concierge since 2018, nothing but the best of service, and now Skip is going to help me into 2023, Be, successful!

Review.Titre: Omar was very resourceful and was able…
Review.Contenu: Omar was very resourceful and was able to help our small business receive the EIDL increase after being turned down 4 times.  He brought out his contacts to push us over the finish line.  Thank you for helping us survive!!!

Review.Titre: Gave great information on steps to take…
Review.Contenu: Gave great information on steps to take to get started apply for grants. They provide follow up to keep you interested in the process

Review.Titre: Amazing experience
Review.Contenu: Amazing experience. I was stuck in the progress of the EIDL loan increase for about four, almost five months. I reached out to the team at SKIP gave they gave me a few resources and contacts over at the SBA to help me get out of my pit hole. (shoutouts to David Uriarte, he was my Funding Concierge). The resources were super helpful and managed to help me fix my problem.It turns out my credit score was the bottom neck. SBA had run my credit score at the beginning of the pandemic, and it was much lower than my current score. They re-pulled my score, which is much higher now, solving my issue. Within a week, I was approved and funded! Thanks to Dave and the outstanding team members at SKIP, my business received the needed funds!

Review.Titre: My thoughts on Ryder and the entire team at skip
Review.Contenu: To give you an honest review: I really love how the people at skip treats people and their matters with the upmost respect and they seem to really care about us and we are very important to them...I always admired how fast they get in touch with us and reach out to us...not every company does that and I really like that about them

Review.Titre: Establishing myself as a New Jersean.
Review.Contenu: Being able to navigate and easily get appointments with NJ government agency and learned how to transfer my information and get new documents that made my transition from NY to a citizen of NJ. From drivers license and converting it to a real ID, car and voters registration, establishing myself at the post office to secure residency, and replacement of my passport. All this was accomplished through my correspondence and instructions from Skip. All done within the span of 1yr. and a half.

Review.Titre: Real and professional people
Review.Contenu: Real people.  Real professional people.  Really want to help.   RARE these days.  A resource any small business should consider.  Ryder's video updates - real, professional, current, targeted, lifeline of accurate information.  RARE these days.

Review.Titre: Great Funding Guidance Using Reconsideration Letter
Review.Contenu: I am so grateful to Ray Begenjova from Skip Concierge for guiding me through my EIDL loan reconsideration letter and process to finally get the funding I needed to build my business through Covid challenges. I highly recommend Skip for business owners who need this one-on-one help. They are friendly, professional, and efficient. Thank you Skip and Ray!

Review.Titre: Jules and Crissy have been great
Review.Contenu: Jules and Crissy have been great. After my first conversation with both, I think that we are going to work great together. She is very professional and knowledgeable about our corporation. I look forward to a long-term relationship with your company and our project manager Crissy Williams helping with our success.

Review.Titre: We are beyond grateful
Review.Contenu: We are beyond grateful. Skip is worth every penny. My Concierge, David is incredible. David is brilliant, tons of info and our company has improved soo much. Highly recommend Skip.

Review.Titre: Awesome Intro to the company - Lily!
Review.Contenu: Lily, my onboarding expert, was terrific! She was upbeat, knowledgeable, seemed to sense what I needed, and ensured I had access to tools to make the best decisions!  I look forward to my future interactions with Lily and the HelloSkip team!

Review.Titre: A guiding light
Review.Contenu: During the pandemic as many businesses were in the dark, not knowing the future of their business. The federal government shot out the cares act. Many of us were in a maze of confusion. When searching who do I talk where do I find these grants? Heck who is the SBA? Well out of the darkness I found my light and a God send sent me SKIP. Everyone if you need a savior I highly recommend getting to know SKIP. A guiding light in a world of business confusion. They Rock!:

Review.Titre: I have been struggling with my ideas…
Review.Contenu: I have been struggling with my ideas for a long time, wondering how I was going to get them started and turn them into a business. I knew I was in good hands when I watched your webinar.

Review.Titre: SKIP and His Team Are The Bomb!
Review.Contenu: I was assigned to Mel. She was phenomenal. She gave me great instructions along the way. She would keep in touch with me by email every 2-3 weeks to find out how the SBA loan process was going. Whenever I hit a snag or was frustrated... she encouraged me and sent me the right forms I needed to send into the SBA. I would not have gotten loan approval without her. I would have given up a long time ago. The SKIP program is the bomb!!!I would highly recommend this program or his counselors to ANYONE dealing with the SBA or any other coaching services that SKIP offers...Dionne

Review.Titre: I was having a very difficult time obtaining our SBA loan, but Skip pulled through and helped me get funded.
Review.Contenu: I was having a very difficult time navigating the EIDL disaster loan process, and was basically in a loop with the SBA that I could not get through, even though I had submitted all the necessary docs. Elisha was very knowledgeable of the process for loan approval, and helped me take the steps needed to finally get funded. If you need assistance, Skip won't disappoint, they know their stuff.

Review.Titre: They've helped me with getting approved…
Review.Contenu: They've helped me with getting approved for PPP and eidl  back in 2021 . Also helped with getting me appointments with DMV that I couldn't get on my own.  Anyone that is has a business and even ones that don't own a business can always learn something from SKIP ! THANK YOU !

Review.Titre: I'm interested to work with you
Review.Contenu: I'm interested to work with you. I love this opportunity to work with your company. Please 🙏 thank you.

Review.Titre: If it hadn't been for the knowledge and…
Review.Contenu: If it hadn't been for the knowledge and how to apply for the SBA grant of $10,000 and $5,000 which I received from SBA. I thankful for Skip because I have learned how to execute the knowledge Skip has given me. I'm grateful for Skip and their expertise

Review.Titre: Ray at HelloSkip has helped me secure…
Review.Contenu: Ray at HelloSkip has helped me secure $200,000 EIDL fundings after my original application and first reconsideration was denied. I was able to make an appointment for a consultation at anytime. Ray is the main reasons why I was able to get funded.Thank you

Review.Titre: I started following Skip during the Covid 19 era…
Review.Contenu: I started following Skip during the COVID for up to date information related to the EIDL grant.  Skip always provided the most up to date information related to what was going on with the SBA and its handling of customers waiting on EIDL loan information.  Skip will always be my go to for up to date information on grants, loans and overall SBA information!  Thanks guys!!

Review.Titre: Ask Skip assistance with my SBA loan application
Review.Contenu: I was intriduced to the Ask Skip organization through YouTube. I'd had no previous experience in requesting federal funding, other than I knew it could be challenging. I was fortunate to have been assigned a representative, Kala Burdo, who knew exactly what to at eacj specific where I could have been stuck for a long time without the proper guidance. I was able to get the full amourt of the loan the government imdicated they would allow. I attribute that to her guidance. I would highly recommend Ask Skip to anyone attempting to access government funding

Review.Titre: Onboarding gave me a sense of hope
Review.Contenu: The onboarding was quick, painless, felt like therapy. I'm excited to be working with someone who will be helping my business find funds to keep running.

Review.Titre: One Stop Grant Resource
Review.Contenu: helloskip.com has become my go-to for information regarding funding my small business for growth.  The updates provided by SKIP consolidate grant funding opportunities in a way that saves entrepreneurs, like myself, the taxing and time consuming research otherwise necessary to continue to fund our small businesses.   This comprehensive resource has allowed me to optimize my time and energy for success!  Thank you, SKIP!

Review.Titre: I appreciate the fact that Skip gets us…
Review.Contenu: I appreciate the fact that Skip gets us answers and his SBA guest was so helpful and informative. The new system is easy to use and supplies us with all info in one spot.

Review.Titre: David and Sufian from SKIP concierge…
Review.Contenu: David and Sufian from SKIP concierge team are excellent and provide outstanding assistance. SKIP has been very helpful platform to myself and I’m sure small business owners and entrepreneurs like myself. Thank You Very Much!

Review.Titre: Ryder with HelloSkip.com is an…
Review.Contenu: Ryder with HelloSkip.com is an excellent resource for information that impacts Status Co. Leather Studio.  It was awesome winning a grant and sharing my business journey on their platform.

Review.Titre: Knowlege
Review.Contenu: It was good Hello Skip- called we did a short briefing but have scheduled another appointment, and that's when she's going to help me with getting funding for my actual small business itself, but we're headed in the right direction. Even though I have some anxiety or are they really going to pull through for me in helping me receive what I need, therefore I do trust them. However, in the interview, she assured me that they will help me navigate through the process and help me receive funding and grant writing. However, my overall experience was Outstanding-Skip has a lot of smart, educated individuals on his team.

Review.Titre: Ray was very helpful
Review.Contenu: Ray was very helpful, since I have been hit by any imaginable denial, identity theft and basically an everyday crap show; I feel she has done her very best for me.

Review.Titre: This is a company that holds true to their values.
Review.Contenu: This is a company that holds true to their values and their mission of helping other businesses. They really care and try to reach out to recourses of all kinds to help the many not the few.

Review.Titre: Ray from Skip was very helpful
Review.Contenu: Ray from Skip was very helpful. She always followed up to see if there was anything I needed and to see if there were any updates. She ultimately led me to the person (TWICE!) that helped me get the EIDL funding I was looking for. After months and months of frustration I am very happy that I decided to give SKIP a shot.

Review.Titre: AWESOME!!!
Review.Contenu: My experience was awesome. My coach Wes, was very patient with me. I really didn't understand a lot but he didn't have a problem going over it again and again. I highly recommend Skip and his team. Especially  my coach, Wes. By the way I got my loan

Review.Titre: This got my attention
Review.Contenu: Skip is really the best source for small business owners to become familiar with what funding and grant programs are available to them.It was a very impressive presentation.

Review.Titre: Expert Funding Advice for Business Owners
Review.Contenu: This company informs entrepreneurs about business funding opportunities they most likely would not have been aware of otherwise. And they provide valuable advice as to how to successfully secure those grants and loans.

Review.Titre: Best Money I Ever Invested in Myself with HelloSkip
Review.Contenu: I wasn't about to spend another dime on this SBA funding situation.  I'd spent over 6.5 months and over 300+ hours trying to get SBA to change a simple account number on a bank account.  What you'd think was the simplest issue became an absolute horrific nightmare with the SBA.  over 273+ emails, contacting over 15 different email addresses only to find out my file had been shifted to 23 different departments within the SBA with "Pass, can't figure it out" basically on top of this folder.  I then met Mel.  Dejected depressed and really upset after what had been a year of hell I spoke to Mel.  She took so much time with me.  It felt like I was back in the 70's again with customer service.  Mel kept telling me not to give up and suggested a few things that I didn't think of.  In the end, if I didn't get with Skip I wouldn't have received my funding.  HelloSkip.com is the marketplace for government-related services and information for both individuals and small businesses. They add new services and information every single week and have excellent customer service. Mel, you're my hero!  Thank you.

Review.Titre: I think this is a great app
